Automatic tree in the sidebar demo

We use the treeview jquery plugin to show collapsible trees.

There are some html/class requirements to get a nice filetree:

  • Start with a UL with classes "filetree" (for css), "automatic-tree" (so that lizard-ui's js sets up the treeview js). And perhaps "pane" if it is used in an accordion.
  • Make sure the html is valid. So a UL contains only LI items. A folder is an LI with an UL inside it.
  • Use spans for the textual content. CSS class "file" for endpoints, "folder" for folders.
  • Use view source to see how it's done on this page.
